column3: Completed build up of NEW system sn 0027.  Tested all sensor inputs successfully.  RF modem tested okay.  Installed new Iridium SIM card. Successfully tested GPS and XMIT functions with roof-mounted antennas connected inside lab.
Ran Current drain test for 2 days, 14.36 mA Average.  Dumped FLASH RAM data file, which looked okay.
Need to run GPS and XMIT test with system antennas (not roof antennas).
Updated Firmware to v 1.16, 161014 for PI1-17-RB, to get German Oxygen sensor data for PI1-17-RB.

This system came back from PI4-17-RB (March 2018) in the Durban air shipment.  Recovered with v1.12, 150313 from 20N-38W, PT013.  No major issues or problems listed in deployment "System Status" info.
Installed SS circuity board Standoffs on bottom of circuit board stack.
Upgraded firmware to v2.01, 170530 & Updated Iridium 1st transmit time to 00:39.
Ran Current drain test for 5 days, 14.15 mA Average.  Dumped FLASH RAM data file, which looked okay.
Installed new Jam seal and face seal Orings.
Successfully tested GPS and Iridium XMIT functions outside on internal antennas.
